definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Jiulongpo district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
uphill/upslope/to move upwards/to climb a slope
Su Dongpo, another name for Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼 (1037-1101), northern Song writer and calligrapher

sentences.english: The water then flows out of the side of the valley to form a spring.
sentences.chinese: 然后，水从山谷坡上流出，形成泉。

sentences.english: Anchorage usually develops in the Southwest seaward slope.
sentences.chinese: 锚地大都发育在西南向海坡。

sentences.english: Contact toxicity of seed extracts from Dodonaea viscose against Sitophilus oryzae were determined.
sentences.chinese: 测定了坡柳种子不同溶剂提取物对米象的触杀作用。

sentences.english: Besides follow high, slope follows poor copy very popular also.
sentences.chinese: 除了高跟，坡跟薄底也很流行。

sentences.english: Then Gideon the son of Joash returned from the battle by the ascent of Heres.
sentences.chinese: 约阿施的儿子基甸由希列斯坡从阵上回来。

sentences.english: I say a horse at a canter coming up, Joe.
sentences.chinese: 一片快速激烈的马蹄声来到坡上。

sentences.english: So, most short men wear big wedge heels.
sentences.chinese: 因此，矮个男人几乎都要穿着坡跟鞋。

sentences.english: Not far upslope were three rounded boulders, lichen-covered, with a hole beneath.
sentences.chinese: 坡上不远处有三个覆盖着青苔的圆石，下面有一个洞。

sentences.english: The sound of a horse at a gallop came fast and furiously up thehill.
sentences.chinese: 一片快速激烈的马蹄声来到坡上。

sentences.english: The Association shares the office with the Chinese School and is open on Saturday morning.
sentences.chinese: 每星期六上午，在富乐顿日光坡高中校舍上课。

sentences.english: A sculptural, sloping roof unites an underground lobby with the covered inner court.
sentences.chinese: 阿雕塑，坡屋面的地下大厅团结的范围内院。

sentences.english: Slope height is a controlling factor in stability of a slope.
sentences.chinese: 坡高与边坡稳定性有密切关系。

sentences.english: Inside a cave dwelling on slope, transmit the sound that little boy cries.
sentences.chinese: 坡上的一户窑洞内，传来小男孩哭泣的声音。

sentences.english: And exciting downhill slops in the world.
sentences.chinese: 和最刺激的滑降坡的所在地。

sentences.english: Edgar Allan Poe had a very hard early life.
sentences.chinese: 爱伦坡的早年生活十分艰辛。

sentences.english: When do you think the slopes might be less crowded ?
sentences.chinese: 你认为什么时候滑雪坡上人会少一些？

definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
